name: Draft Graph p95 Latency > 8s
message:
## Draft Graph p95 Latency Breach

The p95 latency for draft-graph endpoint has exceeded 8 seconds.

**Current:** {{value}} ms
**Threshold:** 8000 ms (8s)
**Environment:** {{env.name}}

**Impact:** Performance SLA breach - users experiencing slow responses.

**Actions:**
1. Check Anthropic API latency in Datadog
2. Review recent deployments for regressions
3. Check if LLM calls are timing out
4. Consider increasing fixture timeout threshold

**Dashboard:** [Draft Service Metrics](https://app.datadoghq.com/dashboard/draft-service)

@slack-olumi-alerts @pagerduty-on-call
